column5: Percher is at Merlands boat is in the water.Glen's truck is ther but Dan can 'find Glen.He wants to go fishin.  Can someone locate Glen?  Mike
if you find the dog pm me and ill give you perchers cell number he just called me as well  who let the dog out
Anyone know what cabin he is in probably to much of grandmas special nobody has a clue at the merland office percher is chomping at the bit to fish
THE DOG HAS BEEN LEASHED AND IS NOW UNDER CONTROL
Did he find him where I said in the PM??? Did he just start banging on doors?? LOL  Not bad....original post went up at 11:14 and by 11:40 it's all done....gotta love the internet....hehe.
Merland would know which cabin the Dawg is in. I also think that Sam might know. He can also bump the redneck's truck and the alarm will go off....instant redneck.
They put alarms on Fords? and what for?
Thought the same thing Paul but after looking at his ride and being a Chevy guy I thought is was really nice. Don't tell him that though
Instant redneck .... and a gun.  JF
Thanks for all your help guys.I never thought of giving his truck a bump ,good idea. Power of the Internet is amazing.
